list.description:
Hello everyone

So, I drew a sight for the AMD.35, but I'm bad at drawing
Got inspired by the recent wave of waifus on sights
Since it's a French tank, I wrote in French the distances

Voilà... I hope you like it?

#amd #amd35 #amd_35_panhard_178 #homemade #handdrawn #art (Maybe not...)

This is a sight for the XM1 GM,
this idea was given to me by "M_A_V_E_R_I_C_K".
Thanks to him!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

#m1a1_aim
English-
I'm posting something that I made last time just in case.Promotional photos... There are traces of using the last image.
(Only available for M1A1 AIM Australia Abrams)

한국어-
저번에 혹시나 하는 생각으로 만들어 두긴 했던 거를 올립니다.홍보 사진은... 저번 이미지를 이용하느라 흔적이 남아있네요.
(오직 M1A1 AIM 호주 에이브람스 만 사용 가능합니다)

for you @Black_dragon481
Modern A-36 collimator uwu

[MOD CANCELLED]
(USA) Historical and semi-historical gun reticles
...

Realistic APX-M590 VAB MEPHISTO sight.

2 versions:
Realistic sight without telemeter (no telemetry indication in the real sight).
Adapted version with telemeter.

no preference to use: gunner's optic is placed at the same place than "standard" sniper view.

All versions haven't mobile componant (exterior circle: hull directionnal indicator).

The folder fr_vcac_mephisto is inclued in the download.

For install, look that tutoriel (English or french)
https://forum.warthunder.com/t/install-a-custom-sight/6915
https://forum.warthunder.com/t/installer-un-vis...
